data.author: kaaku

changelog.release_notes: - change host server of setting page

- add function of the push timeline pin of selected item 
- separate general menu with two parts (More... menu)
- add App icon for firmware version 4
support another iCalendar format of event replacement

- speed up key repeat on setting alarm time
- more bigger alarm time of dialog window

- fix issue of iCalendar's modified repeat event
- add check of overflow item counts

- Add Wakeup by Alarm option 
- fix bug of focus changed after sorting
add Title menu item of "iCalendar alarm" which alarm on/off on loading items

- add import feature to import other TileList file
- fix display bug of iCalender title with semi-colon

- Add support format of iCalendar (.ics) such as exported from Outlook
- Show popup message on alarm vibe
- Add selection of Time List History on config page

Add general menu item of Add Alarm item/Delete item
Fix some bugs
reduce error of difference of days

fix AM/PM display bug with second display
some initial value modified
Add NextTrain (japan) format support (".tbl" file extension is treated as NextTrain format)

data.description:
Multi Time Viewer is a versatile time event viewer.

This App show remaining time/day and elapsed time/day of each time event.

You can use this app multi purpose like as
 - Daily/Weekly/Monthly routine time scheduler
 - Next Train time viewer
 - iCalender event viewer
 - World time clock

Time type of event
* Periodical Time
  - Daily, Weekly, Monthly, Yearly
* Absolute Time
* Offset Time
  - offset from current UTC time

How to use
1. Create plain text Time List file.
2. Upload the Time List file to Web file server like as Dropbox.
3. Open SETTING Page and input Published URL of the Time List.
4. Push Save button and Pebble load the Time List.

For more detail of Time List , Please look Samples on SETTING Page

Key Operation
* On Normal Screen
- Up/Down to scroll items
- Enter to open Menu (Title Menu on Title, General Menu on Item)
- Long push Enter to do something which assined in menu
* On Menu
- Up/Down to scroll menu
- Enter to select/change item
- Back to quit menu

Title Menu items
- Load Time List from Web server
- Delete Title from Pebble
- NextTrain Holiday setting

General Menu items
- Goto Next item (may need to be sort by time)
- Goto Top item
- Push Timeline pin
- Toggle Alarm (vibe) the item On/Off
- Alarm Mode
- Days format 
- Periodic Time treat as past or future
- Sort items type
- Display Second
- Add Alarm item near this item
- Add Alarm item near current time
- Wakeup App by Alarm
- Highlighting Item time Font size
- Color Thema
- Assign Long Push
- Date format 
- Time Type
- Disconnect Vibe
data.title: Multi Time Viewer
